attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: within the last year we have seen an increase in airport tax,congestion charges,pay as you drive,4x4 tax and now chip n bin tax and countless other taxes over the labour reign what is next oxygen tax.I would suggest that 75% of what we earn is going on taxes now. do you think the country is in a better state now than what it was 10 years ago sign this petition as a vote of no confidence in the current government and their current policies
